item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup members,
How are you?

Last month we had a great discussion about "Peace"! Thank you all for joining me. We shared a lot of information. I learned a lot from all of you and the game was great too!
Peace is from inside not from outside. If we seek peace from outside, we might miss it. Even we are in the most peaceful place, we will still not get peace. because our mind may not peaceful.

This month, we are going to discuss "the meaning of life". This is a wonderful topic. All the human beings are wondering what the purpose of life is? Am I happy about my life? Do I find the meaning of life? We can share more and enrich our life.

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

looking forward to meeting you




About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the second building on your right when you drive into condos. please park with the sign of visit parking only, Thanks
item.name: Westborough Spirituality November Meetup! Topic: the meaning of life
